sentence.Network_en: The second car was flying the Ghanaian pennant.
sentence.Network_cn: 第二辆车插着加纳的三角旗。

sentence.Network_en: Kunta had been rocked to the core by his encounter with the Ghanaian.

sentence.Network_en: If she was Swedish or Ghanaian it would get little attention.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果她是瑞典人或是加纳人就不会受到任何关注.

entry.def: Something that is Ghanaian belongs or relates to Ghana or to its people.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or characteristic of Ghana or its people or language;
